duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for data migration, data clean up, data integration, and warehousing for the company.
Importing data, manipulating data, putting it back in, querying, and building indexes using MS SQL.
Loading and validating dimensions and measures using SSIS.
Importing data, querying data, getting data out of Salesforce, and using SOQL.
Experience with Oracle or PostgreSQL and familiarity with Talend, Matillion, or similar tools would be considered a plus.
